concise_definition: n. 斯温顿（英国英格兰格洛斯特郡的一个城镇）

definitions.explanation_en: A town in Wiltshire, England, located approximately 70 miles west of London; known for its historical significance in the railway industry and as a major commercial and residential center in the South West of England.
definitions.explanation_cn: 英国威尔特郡的一个城镇，位于伦敦以西约70英里处；以铁路工业的历史重要性以及作为英格兰西南部主要商业和住宅中心而闻名。
definitions.example_en: She moved to Swindon after graduating from university to work in logistics.
definitions.example_cn: 她大学毕业后搬到斯温顿，在物流行业工作。
